name: Project Voxime
description:
A really simple game that doesn't have much to offer. Its a voxel building game set in a 40x40 world with only 3 blocks. You place the block you build off of, and you can double jump. 

Notes:
-Collision is basically non-existent
-This game isn't optimized making it run poorly 
-The game isn't finished 
-Oh for the love of all things holy just don't
